summary: Completed full local development setup for 6amMart Laravel application. Created .env file, installed all PHP and Node.js dependencies, configured database connection to existing MariaDB Docker container, imported SQL dump file, and successfully ran all migrations including BeautyBooking module migrations. Application server is running on http://127.0.0.1:8000. All database tables created successfully.
current_status: Application is fully set up and ready for local development. Database configured with MariaDB Docker container. All migrations completed including BeautyBooking module. Development server running. Ready to start development work.
